metadata.title: CVE-2021-47260 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFS: Fix a potential NULL dereference in nfs_get_client()None of the callers are expecting NULL returns from nfs_get_client() sothis code will lead to an Oops.  It's better to return an errorpointer.  I expect that this is dead code so hopefully no one isaffected.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
